task.title: Replicating Installation for Multiple Standalone Agents

context.p: This section introduces a more efficient method to replicate installation for multiple standalone agents with the same license file and product serial number.

step.cmd: Refer to for getting the license file and product serial number.
Place the license file as the top-level file in the agent's Installer Package.
Open the file in the Installer Package and specify the value for the product_serial_number parameter.

note.p: Input the product serial number obtained in Step 1 as the value for product_serial_number parameter.

step.cmd: Save the Installer Package in the target endpoints for installation.
Launch the Installer in silent mode.
